exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ProgressBar" width="419" height="32" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="progressBg_png" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" source="progressBar_png" x="5" y="5"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="action" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="imgBg" width="600" height="800" x="-60"/>

	<e:Image source="diamondsPanel_png" x="290" y="5.5"/>
	<e:Image source="diamonds_png" x="272" y="-0.5"/>
	<e:Label id="diamond" text="4220" x="350" y="15.5" bold="true"/>

	<e:Image source="moneyPanel_png" x="8.5" y="5.5"/>
	<e:Image source="moneyIcon_png" x="6.5" y="3.5"/>
	<e:Label id="money" text="4.12G" x="81.5" y="16.5" bold="true" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
	<e:Label id="speed" text="127M/秒" x="66.5" y="55.5" textColor="0x474343" bold="true" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" size="22"/>

	<!--场景切换-->
	<e:Image source="sceneIconPlate_png" y="140" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8"/>
	<e:ToggleButton id="scene1" x="0" y="105" width="54" height="54" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" selected="true" touchEnabled="false">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="sceneIconLight1_png" source.down="sceneIconDark1_png"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:ToggleButton>
	<e:ToggleButton id="scene2" label="" x="43" y="105" width="54" height="54" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8">
		<e:skinName>
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="sceneIconLight2_png" source.down="sceneIconDark2_png"/>
		</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:ToggleButton>
	<e:ToggleButton id="scene3" label="" x="86" y="105" width="54" height="54" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8">
		<e:skinName>
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="sceneIconLight3_png" source.down="sceneIconDark3_png"/>
		</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:ToggleButton>
	<e:ToggleButton id="scene4" label="" x="129" y="105" width="54" height="54" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8">
		<e:skinName>
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="sceneIconLight4_png" source.down="sceneIconDark4_png"/>
		</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:ToggleButton>
	<e:ToggleButton id="scene5" label="" x="172" y="105" width="54" height="54" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8">
		<e:skinName>
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="sceneIconLight5_png" source.down="sceneIconDark5_png"/>
		</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:ToggleButton>
	<e:ToggleButton id="scene6" label="" x="215" y="105" width="54" height="54" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8">
		<e:skinName>
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="sceneIconLight6_png" source.down="sceneIconDark6_png"/>
		</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:ToggleButton>
	<e:Label horizontalCenter="-218.5" text="园区" size="13" y="138" textColor="0xffffff" fontFamily="SimHei" bold="true" strokeColor="0x560101" stroke="1" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Label horizontalCenter="-175.5" text="野外" size="13" y="138" textColor="0xFFFFFF" fontFamily="SimHei" bold="true" strokeColor="0x560101" stroke="1" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Label text="树林" size="13" y="138" textColor="0xFFFFFF" fontFamily="SimHei" bold="true" strokeColor="0x560101" stroke="1" touchEnabled="false" x="94"/>
	<e:Label horizontalCenter="-89.5" text="海边" size="13" y="138" textColor="0xFFFFFF" fontFamily="SimHei" bold="true" strokeColor="0x560101" stroke="1" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Label text="沙漠" size="13" y="138" textColor="0xFFFFFF" fontFamily="SimHei" bold="true" strokeColor="0x560101" stroke="1" touchEnabled="false" x="180"/>
	<e:Label horizontalCenter="-3.5" text="极地" size="13" y="138" textColor="0xFFFFFF" fontFamily="SimHei" bold="true" strokeColor="0x560101" stroke="1" touchEnabled="false"/>

    <!--左侧-->
    <e:Image id="oneYuan" source="oneYuan_png" x="18.5" y="528.66" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8"/>
	<e:Image id="monthCard" source="monthCard_png" x="18.5" y="600.66" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8"/>
	<e:Image id="luckyWheel" source="luckyWheel_png" x="18.5" y="672.66" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8"/>
	<e:Label text="1元礼包" x="12.83" y="569.86" fontFamily="SimHei" size="21" textColor="0xffffff" bold="true" strokeColor="0x5c320e" stroke="3" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Label text="月卡" x="25.7" y="641.86" fontFamily="SimHei" size="21" textColor="0xFFFFFF" bold="true" strokeColor="0x5C320E" stroke="3" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Label text="转盘" x="26.03" y="713.86" fontFamily="SimHei" size="21" textColor="0xFFFFFF" bold="true" strokeColor="0x5C320E" stroke="3" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" touchEnabled="false"/>

    <!--下侧-->
    <e:Image source="iconPlate_png" x="56.63" y="755.96" scaleX="0.75" scaleY="0.75"/>
	<e:Image id="recruit" source="recruit_png" x="81.5" y="738" scaleX="0.75" scaleY="0.75"/>
	<e:Image id="classroom" source="class_png" x="135.5" y="738" scaleX="0.75" scaleY="0.75"/>
	<e:Image id="friends" source="friends_png" x="189" y="738" scaleX="0.75" scaleY="0.75"/>
	<e:Image id="home" source="home_png" x="241" y="738" scaleX="0.75" scaleY="0.75"/>
	<e:Image id="clothes" source="clothes_png" x="295" y="738" scaleX="0.75" scaleY="0.75"/>
	<e:Image id="mall" source="mall_png" x="348" y="738" scaleX="0.75" scaleY="0.75"/>
	<e:Label text="招募" x="87" y="775" fontFamily="SimHei" bold="true" textColor="0xffffff" strokeColor="0x5c320e" stroke="3" scaleX="0.75" scaleY="0.75" size="25" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Label text="课堂" x="142" y="775" fontFamily="SimHei" bold="true" textColor="0xFFFFFF" strokeColor="0x5C320E" stroke="3" scaleX="0.75" scaleY="0.75" size="25" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Label text="社交" x="196" y="775" fontFamily="SimHei" bold="true" textColor="0xFFFFFF" strokeColor="0x5C320E" stroke="3" scaleX="0.75" scaleY="0.75" size="25" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Label text="家园" x="249" y="775" fontFamily="SimHei" bold="true" textColor="0xFFFFFF" strokeColor="0x5C320E" stroke="3" scaleX="0.75" scaleY="0.75" size="25" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Label text="时装" x="303" y="775" fontFamily="SimHei" bold="true" textColor="0xFFFFFF" strokeColor="0x5C320E" stroke="3" scaleX="0.75" scaleY="0.75" size="25" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Label text="商城" x="356" y="775" fontFamily="SimHei" bold="true" textColor="0xFFFFFF" strokeColor="0x5C320E" stroke="3" scaleX="0.75" scaleY="0.75" size="25" touchEnabled="false"/>

	<!--右侧-->
    <e:Image source="hideLight_png" x="370.7" y="138.66" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8"/>
	<e:Image source="switcherPanel_png" x="406.7" y="126.66" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8"/>
	<e:Image id="switcher" source="switcherLight_png" x="413.2" y="134.66" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8"/>
	<e:Image id="task" source="task_png" x="410" y="194"  scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8"/>

	<e:Image id="jigsaw" source="jigsaw_png" x="410" y="266"  scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8"/>
	<e:Image id="redPacket" source="redPacket_png" x="410" y="338"  scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8"/>
	<e:Image id="handbook" source="handbook_png" x="410" y="410" width="61" height="62"  scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8"/>
	<e:Image id="horn" source="horn_png" x="410" y="482"  scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8"/>
	<e:Label text="任务"  x="418" y="240" fontFamily="SimHei" size="21" strokeColor="0x5c320e" stroke="3" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Label text="拼图"  x="418" y="310" fontFamily="SimHei" size="21" strokeColor="0x5C320E" stroke="3" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Label text="红包"  x="418" y="380" fontFamily="SimHei" size="21" strokeColor="0x5C320E" stroke="3" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Label text="图鉴"  x="418" y="450" fontFamily="SimHei" size="21" strokeColor="0x5C320E" stroke="3" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Label text="消息"  x="418" y="520" fontFamily="SimHei" size="21" strokeColor="0x5C320E" stroke="3" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" touchEnabled="false"/>
    
	<e:Image id="energy" source="energy_png"  x="410" y="194" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" visible="false"/>
	<e:Image id="rank" source="rank_png"  x="410" y="266" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" visible="false"/>
	<e:Image id="mail" source="mail_png"  x="410" y="338" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" visible="false"/>
	<e:Image id="setting" source="setting_png"  x="410" y="410" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" visible="false"/>
	<e:Label text="能量"  x="418" y="240" size="21" fontFamily="SimHei" strokeColor="0x5c320e" stroke="3" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" touchEnabled="false" visible="false"/>
	<e:Label text="排行"  x="418" y="310" size="21" fontFamily="SimHei" strokeColor="0x5C320E" stroke="3" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" touchEnabled="false" visible="false"/>
	<e:Label text="邮件"  x="418" y="380" size="21" fontFamily="SimHei" strokeColor="0x5C320E" stroke="3" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" touchEnabled="false" visible="false"/>
	<e:Label text="设置"  x="418" y="450" size="21" fontFamily="SimHei" strokeColor="0x5C320E" stroke="3" scaleX="0.8" scaleY="0.8" touchEnabled="false" visible="false"/>
	<e:Group id="animal" width="306" height="510" x="87.25" y="190.8" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
	</e:Group>

</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="classListIRSkin" width="292" height="61" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="101%" height="100%" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" scale9Grid="25,11,152,66" x="0" y="0" source="mallPanelListIR_png"/>
	<e:Image x="4" y="41" anchorOffsetX="0" width="62" anchorOffsetY="0" height="12" source="mallIconShadow_png"/>
	<e:Image anchorOffsetX="0" width="55.75" anchorOffsetY="0" height="48" x="7.13" y="2" source="{data.icon}"/>
	<e:Label x="69.5" y="8.25" anchorOffsetX="0" width="135.75" fontFamily="SimHei" strokeColor="0xb07a4d" stroke="0.5" anchorOffsetY="0" height="22.25" size="18" textColor="0x7a441f" text="{data.name}"/>
	<e:Label text="{data.func}" x="69.5" y="31.5" anchorOffsetX="0" width="150.25" fontFamily="SimHei" strokeColor="0xb07a4d" stroke="0.5" anchorOffsetY="0" height="12.5" size="11" textColor="0xc1733e"/>
	<e:Button label="" x="214" y="17.67" width="59.33" height="23.33" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btnMallBuyDark_png" source.down="btnMallBuyLight_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Label x="229" y="20" size="15" fontFamily="SimHei" text="{data.learn}" touchEnabled="false"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="classUISkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="bg_png"/>
	<e:Image source="oneYuanPanel_png" scale9Grid="44,32,266,195" anchorOffsetY="0" height="461" anchorOffsetX="0" width="359.34" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image source="oneYuanPanelBottom_png" x="60" y="579"/>
	<e:Image source="oneYuanPanelTop_png" x="375" y="170"/>
	<e:Image source="oneYuanTips_png" y="131.45" horizontalCenter="-0.5"/>
	<e:Label text="课堂" y="146.5" fontFamily="SimHei" bold="true" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image source="mallBg_png" scale9Grid="16,8,37,45" width="292" height="316" horizontalCenter="0" y="275"/>

	<!--egroup-->
	<e:Group height="100%" width="100%" touchThrough="true">
		<e:TabBar dataProvider="{viewStack}" x="95" y="211" width="286">
			<e:layout>
				<e:HorizontalLayout gap="20"/>
			</e:layout>
			<e:itemRendererSkinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down" height="50">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source.up="btnRecruitLight_png" source.down="btnRecruitDark_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
					<e:Label text="{data}" width="133" height="48" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" fontFamily="SimHei" size="25" strokeColor="0xb24c4c" stroke="0.8"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:itemRendererSkinName>
		</e:TabBar>
		<e:ViewStack id="viewStack" height="316" width="292" x="94" y="275">

			<!--展示第一个选项卡-->
			<e:Group name="萌宠技能" width="100%" height="100%">
				<e:Scroller id="scrListClass1" width="100%" height="100%">
					<e:viewport>
						<e:List id="listClass1" width="100%" height="100%" y="34">
							<e:layout>
								<e:VerticalLayout/>
							</e:layout>
						</e:List>
					</e:viewport>
				</e:Scroller>
			</e:Group>

			<!--展示第二个选项卡-->
			<e:Group name="稀有技能" width="100%" height="100%">
				<e:Scroller id="scrListClass2" width="100%" height="100%">
					<e:viewport>
						<e:List id="listClass2" width="100%" height="100%" y="34">
							<e:layout>
								<e:VerticalLayout/>
							</e:layout>
						</e:List>
					</e:viewport>
				</e:Scroller>
			</e:Group>

		</e:ViewStack>
	</e:Group>

	<e:Image horizontalCenter="-0.5" source="bottomShadow_png" y="555" width="292"/>
	<e:Button id="btnClose" label="" x="386" y="145.5" width="52" height="53">
		<e:skinName>
		<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="oneYuanPanelCloseDark_png" source.down="oneYuanPanelCloseLIght_png"/>
		</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>

</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="mallListIRSkin" width="292" height="61" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="mallPanelListIR_png" width="101%" height="100%" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" scale9Grid="25,11,152,66" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Image source="mallIconShadow_png" x="4" y="41" anchorOffsetX="0" width="62" anchorOffsetY="0" height="12"/>
	<e:Image anchorOffsetX="0" width="55.75" anchorOffsetY="0" height="48" x="7.13" y="2" source="{data.icon}"/>
	<e:Label x="69.5" y="8.25" anchorOffsetX="0" width="135.75" fontFamily="SimHei" strokeColor="0xb07a4d" stroke="0.5" anchorOffsetY="0" height="22.25" size="18" textColor="0x7a441f" text="{data.goods}"/>
	<e:Label text="data.func" x="69.5" y="31.5" anchorOffsetX="0" width="150.25" fontFamily="SimHei" strokeColor="0xb07a4d" stroke="0.5" anchorOffsetY="0" height="12.5" size="11" textColor="0xc1733e"/>
	<e:Button label="" x="214" y="17.67" width="59.33" height="23.33" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btnMallBuyDark_png" source.down="btnMallBuyLight_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Label x="220" y="20" size="15" fontFamily="SimHei" text="{data.money}" touchEnabled="false"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="mallUISkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="bg_png"/>
	<e:Image source="oneYuanPanel_png" y="183" scale9Grid="44,32,266,195" anchorOffsetY="0" height="461" anchorOffsetX="0" width="359.34" horizontalCenter="-0.5"/>
	<e:Image y="137.45" anchorOffsetX="0" width="391" anchorOffsetY="0" height="91.09" horizontalCenter="0" source="mallRoof_png"/>
	<e:Image source="oneYuanPanelBottom_png" x="60" y="579"/>
	<e:Image source="oneYuanTips_png" y="98" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Label text="商城" y="115.5" fontFamily="SimHei" horizontalCenter="0" bold="true"/>
	<e:Button id="btnClose" label="" x="384" y="110.95" width="52" height="53">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="oneYuanPanelCloseDark_png" source.down="oneYuanPanelCloseLIght_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Image source="mallBg_png" x="94" y="240" scale9Grid="16,8,37,45" width="292" height="383"/>
	<e:Scroller id="scrListMall" width="292" height="383" x="94" y="240">
        <e:viewport>
		    <e:List id="listMall">
					<e:layout>
						<e:VerticalLayout/>
					</e:layout>
            </e:List>
        </e:viewport>
	</e:Scroller>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="recruitListIRSkin" width="292" height="61" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="mallPanelListIR_png" width="101%" height="100%" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" scale9Grid="25,11,152,66" x="0" y="0"/>
	<e:Image source="mallIconShadow_png" x="4" y="41" anchorOffsetX="0" width="62" anchorOffsetY="0" height="12"/>
	<e:Image anchorOffsetX="0" width="55.75" anchorOffsetY="0" height="48" x="7.13" y="2" source="{data.icon}"/>
	<e:Label x="69.5" y="8.25" anchorOffsetX="0" width="135.75" fontFamily="SimHei" strokeColor="0xb07a4d" stroke="0.5" anchorOffsetY="0" height="22.25" size="18" textColor="0x7a441f" text="{data.name}"/>
	<e:Label x="69.5" y="31.5" anchorOffsetX="0" width="150.25" fontFamily="SimHei" strokeColor="0xb07a4d" stroke="0.5" anchorOffsetY="0" height="12.5" size="11" textColor="0xc1733e" text="{data.num}"/>
	<e:Button label="" x="214" y="17.67" width="59.33" height="23.33" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btnMallBuyDark_png" source.down="btnMallBuyLight_png"/>
			<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
	<e:Label x="224" y="20" size="15" fontFamily="SimHei" text="{data.buy}" touchEnabled="false"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="recruitUISkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="bg_png"/>
	<e:Image source="oneYuanPanel_png" scale9Grid="44,32,266,195" anchorOffsetY="0" height="461" anchorOffsetX="0" width="359.34" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image source="oneYuanPanelBottom_png" x="60" y="579"/>
	<e:Image source="oneYuanPanelTop_png" x="375" y="170"/>
	<e:Image source="oneYuanTips_png" y="131.45" horizontalCenter="-0.5"/>
	<e:Label text="招募" y="146.5" fontFamily="SimHei" bold="true" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image source="mallBg_png" scale9Grid="16,8,37,45" width="292" height="316" horizontalCenter="0" y="275"/>

	<!--egroup-->
	<e:Group height="100%" width="100%" touchThrough="true">
		<e:TabBar dataProvider="{viewStack}" x="95" y="211" width="286">
			<e:layout>
				<e:HorizontalLayout gap="20"/>
			</e:layout>
			<e:itemRendererSkinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down" height="50">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source.up="btnRecruitLight_png" source.down="btnRecruitDark_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
					<e:Label text="{data}" width="133" height="48" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" fontFamily="SimHei" size="25" strokeColor="0xb24c4c" stroke="0.8"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:itemRendererSkinName>
		</e:TabBar>
		<e:ViewStack id="viewStack" height="316" width="292" x="94" y="275">

			<!--展示第一个选项卡-->
			<e:Group name="购买宠物" width="100%" height="100%">
				<e:Scroller id="scrListRecruit" width="100%" height="100%">
					<e:viewport>
						<e:List id="listRecruit" width="100%" height="100%" y="34">
							<e:layout>
								<e:VerticalLayout/>
							</e:layout>
						</e:List>
					</e:viewport>
				</e:Scroller>
			</e:Group>

		</e:ViewStack>
	</e:Group>

	<e:Image horizontalCenter="-0.5" source="bottomShadow_png" y="555" width="292"/>
	<e:Button id="btnClose" label="" x="386" y="145.5" width="52" height="53">

			<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="oneYuanPanelCloseDark_png" source.down="oneYuanPanelCloseLIght_png"/>
		</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>

</e:Skin>
